game.name: Zory
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You will have to play as fighters against evil and monsters in the world of Slavic mythology, as well as craft and build some buildings of your camp to improve weapons, armor and cooking.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You will have to play as fighters against evil and monsters in the world of Slavic mythology, as well as craft and build some buildings of your camp to improve weapons, armor and cooking.
